name: 彭祖乙
objective:
數位科技與人工智慧是資訊科技發展的兩大重要驅動力，本課程旨在培養本系學生在此領域學習的藍圖與概念建立。本課程將介紹數位科技與人工智慧的基本概念、原理與應用。在數位科技方面，將涵蓋 IT 基礎設施、網際網路、資訊安全、虛擬化與雲端，IoT 等主題。在人工智慧方面，將涵蓋機器學習、深度學習、自然語言處理、電腦視覺等主題。
Digital Technology and Artificial Intelligence are two major driving forces of the development of information technology. This course aims to cultivate students' learning blueprints and concepts in this field. This course will introduce the basic concepts, principles and applications of digital technology and artificial intelligence.
In the areas of digital technology, it will cover topics such as IT infrastructure, the Internet, information security, virtualization and cloud computing, and IoT. In the areas of artificial intelligence, it will cover topics such as machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.
